A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi can be summarized in twenty minutes of screen time or a simple phrase: No one\, nothing\, doesn't matter. Essentially\, no one is important other than Rey and Kylo\, nothing new happens or a build up of suspicion or suspense turns out to be nothing\, and in the end Snoke\, Luke\, Holdo\, Leia\, Phasma\, DJ\, Ackbar\, Rose\, Finn\, BB-9\, Hux\, etc. are all meaningless to the plot. The entire movie boils down to: Rey is a Jedi\, Kylo is a bad dude\, and both are super powerful\, the end.
